testimonials.name: Sarah Chen
testimonials.title: Solo Developer
testimonials.quote: HostJamstack took my Next.js project from local development to production in under 2 hours. No DevOps headaches, just a live site with SSL and everything configured perfectly.

testimonials.name: Marcus Rodriguez
testimonials.title: Freelance Designer
testimonials.quote: I used to dread the deployment phase of projects. Now with the Launch Pack, I can focus on design while they handle all the hosting complexity. My clients love the fast, secure sites.

testimonials.name: Jenny Park
testimonials.title: Startup Founder
testimonials.quote: The Migration Mini package saved us weeks of work moving our marketing site to modern hosting. Zero downtime cutover and our site is now blazing fast on the edge network.

testimonials.name: David Thompson
testimonials.title: Student Developer
testimonials.quote: As someone learning web development, HostJamstack bridges the gap between "it works on my laptop" and having a real production site. The First Deploy pack is perfect for beginners.

testimonials.name: Lisa Chang
testimonials.title: Small Business Owner
testimonials.quote: I built my site with Lovable but had no idea how to get it live properly. The Launch Pack handled domains, SSL, performance headers - everything I needed but couldn't figure out myself.

testimonials.name: Alex Kumar
testimonials.title: Creative Agency
testimonials.quote: We can now promise clients professional hosting without needing a dedicated DevOps person. Quick fixes and deployments happen in hours, not days. Game changer for our agency.

callToAction.description: We're here to help you get your site live and running smoothly.
